titleStmt.title: Januæ clavis: or, Lilly's syntax explained its elegancy from good authors cleared, its fundamentals compared with the Accidence, and the rules thereof more fitted to the capacity of children. By Jonathan Banks.
titleStmt.author: Banks, Jonathan.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold by Benjamin Clarke in George-Yard in Lumbard-Street,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: Januæ clavis, or, Lilly's syntax, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
